gpt-5.name: gpt-5
gpt-5.description: GPT-5, a full reasoning model provides deep, richer reasoning for analytics and complex tasks, like code generation, with a 272k token context.

text-embedding-3-small.description: Embedding model with up to 1536 dimensions

gpt-4o-transcribe.description: STT (Speech-To-Text) model. Converts speech to text

essay-assistant-gpt.name: essay-assistant-gpt
essay-assistant-gpt.description: A simple AI Assistant that generates essays based on user requests. **Note: This is a single-shot application (it does not include previous messages in the context).**

echo.name: echo
echo.description: Simple application that is mirroring input from request to response

quickapp-standalone.description: Standalone application configured with Quick App 2.0 Application runner

display.description: The configuration for the tool parameter in stage.

default.description: The default value if value is not set
default.title: Default

name.description: The name of the tool stage. Can contain placeholders for tool arguments in curly braces.
name.title: Name

body.description: The body of the tool stage. Can contain placeholders for tool arguments in curly braces.
body.title: Body

show.description: Whether the tool stage should be shown in the chat.
show.title: Show

type.description: The type of the trigger on condition.

ignore.description: Whether to show parameter with value in the stage content.
ignore.title: Ignore

ignore_parameter_name.description: Whether to show parameter name in the stage content.
ignore_parameter_name.title: Ignore Parameter Name

show_value_in_stage_title.description: Whether to show parameter value in the stage title.
show_value_in_stage_title.title: Show Value In Stage Title

name.description: If present then will be used instead of original name, otherwise will be used original name.
name.title: Name

prefix.description: The prefix to be added after parameter name and before parameter value.
prefix.title: Prefix

suffix.description: The suffix to be added after parameter value.
suffix.title: Suffix

replaced_value_info.description: The replaced parameter value that will shown in the stage content.
replaced_value_info.title: Replaced Value Info

format.description: The format of the parameter value. If present then the value will be wrapped in ```{format} {parameter value}```.
format.title: Format

instructions.title: Instructions

variables.description: Variables to be used in the DIAL system prompt
variables.title: Variables

display.description: The configuration for the tool parameter in stage.

default.description: The default value if value is not set
default.title: Default

temperature.description: The temperature for the model. A higher temperature means the model will take more risks.
temperature.title: Temperature

top_p.description: The number of top tokens to sample from. A higher value means more randomness.
top_p.title: Top P

seed.description: The seed for the model. Can be used for enhancing reproducibility of models' responses.
seed.title: Seed

stop.description: Up to 4 sequences where the Assistant will stop generating further tokens.
stop.title: Stop

n.description: How many chat completion choices to generate for each input message.
n.title: N

max_tokens.description: The maximum number of tokens to generate by the Assistant.
max_tokens.title: Max Tokens

presence_penalty.description: A number between -2.0 and 2.0. Positive values impose a penalty on new tokens based on their appearance in the current text, thereby increasing the model's tendency to introduce new topics in its responses.
presence_penalty.title: Presence Penalty

frequency_penalty.description: A number between -2.0 and 2.0. Positive values apply a penalty to new tokens according to their existing frequency in the preceding text, thereby reducing the model's propensity to repeat the exact same line.
frequency_penalty.title: Frequency Penalty
